title: Graded T206's For Sale Waddell, Chase, Marquard

posts.post_title: Graded T206's For Sale Waddell, Chase, Marquard
posts.post_content:
I have a few T206's for sale. All prices include insured delivery. I am having trouble uploading scans but will email them on request.

Waddell Throwing SGC 40 (looks Vg/Ex)  $120.00  SOLD

Chase Blue Portrait PSA 2                    $45.00    SOLD

Marquard Portrait SGC 10                    $35.00  SOLD

Schaeffer PSA 3 (name top/bottom)     $35.00   SOLD
      
Lumley raw Vg  (name top/bottom)       $40.00   SOLD

Will consider trades for Red Sox types I do not have.
                                                  Thanks,
                                                    Steve

Hi Steven

I have sent you a PM

Jantz
Bump. Lowered prices on a couple cards. Trade offers welcome.........
PM sent on Schaeffer and Lumley.
